explains: n. 警察，警员；[分化] 淀帚（橡皮头玻璃搅棒）
wordGroup: traffic policeman n. 交通警察

sentences.en: An injured policeman was led away by colleagues.
sentences.cn: 一位受伤的警察被同事们带走了。

sentences.en: The policeman reached down and petted the wolfhound.
sentences.cn: 警察伸出手，摸了摸那条猎狼犬。

sentences.en: The policeman asked me to blow into the breathalyser.
sentences.cn: 警察要我对着呼吸检测仪吹气。
